page.title: 02Sandford St Martin
page.content: Sandford is the second largest area of housing in our 12KM squares.They have a church that has a tower,lych-gate,yew tree,parapet,bell louvres and a table tomb.In Sandford there is a village hall that once stood in Ardly but in 1927 it was took down stone by stone and put up in Sandford now it is used for childrens parties and council meetings.In Sandford there is a green grocers mobile shop that comes round every Tuesdays and Fridays and there is a mobile baker that comes on Tuesdays and Fridays and there is a fishmonger that comes round every Friday lunch times.They get their milk and papers from the shop in Middle Barton.
